name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.ha.tail-edits.period
description:
How often, the StandbyNode and ObserverNode should check if there are new
    edit log entries ready to be consumed. This is the minimum period between
    checking; exponential backoff will be applied if no edits are found and
    dfs.ha.tail-edits.period.backoff-max is configured. By default, no
    backoff is applied.
    Supports multiple time unit suffix (case insensitive), as described
    in dfs.heartbeat.interval.

name: mapreduce.jobhistory.loadedjobs.cache.size
description:
Size of the loaded job cache.  This property is ignored if
  the property mapreduce.jobhistory.loadedtasks.cache.size is set to a
  positive value.

name: dfs.namenode.delegation.token.max-lifetime
description:
The maximum lifetime in milliseconds for which a delegation 
      token is valid.

name: mapreduce.jobhistory.max-age-ms
description:
Job history files older than this many milliseconds will
  be deleted when the history cleaner runs. Defaults to 604800000 (1 week).
